title: Netanyahu Suggests Other Officials to Blame for Oct. 7 Failings
summary_full: In a document released on Thursday night, the Israeli leader sought to distance himself from responsibility for intelligence and security failings before the Hamas-led attack.
summary_public: In a document released on Thursday night, the Israeli leader sought to distance himself from responsibility for intelligence and security failings before the Hamas-led attack.

IL.label: neutral
IL.evidence: Israeli leader sought to distance himself from responsibility
